title: Environment-aware ChainRegistry with testnet configs
description:
attached_molecule: ev-wisp-2gg
attached_at: 2026-02-14T14:35:05Z
attached_args: SKIP PLAN MODE. Implement directly.
dispatched_by: mayor

Add testnet support to EvmIntegration. 1) Promote sepolia-config from demo-ui to main src/registry/configs/sepolia.json. 2) Add isTestnet metadata flag to ChainConfig type. 3) Make ChainRegistry constructor accept NetworkEnvironment parameter and filter configs accordingly (production loads mainnet only, testnet loads testnet only, local loads all). 4) Add environment prefix to CacheManager keys. 5) Create E2E tests using Sepolia with known test addresses.
notes: Verified all 5 requirements already implemented and merged: (1) sepolia.json promoted to src/registry/configs/, (2) isTestnet flag in ChainConfig, (3) env-aware ChainRegistry with NetworkEnvironment, (4) CacheManager env prefix, (5) E2E tests with Sepolia. All 717 tests + 10 e2e pass green.
close_reason: Work already implemented and merged — 717 tests + 10 e2e passing per polecat notes

title: E2E: fix failing tests, align with enterprise strategy
description:
attached_molecule: ev-wisp-dml
attached_at: 2026-02-15T05:42:02Z
dispatched_by: mayor

Enterprise E2E strategy (enterprise-arch/e2e-testing-strategy.md) requires EvmIntegration to have working E2E tests. Current test:e2e script fails.

Action items:
1. Fix the failing ChainRegistry.e2e.test.ts
2. Align E2E scenarios with enterprise policy: chain registry load (P0), testnet RPC connectivity (P0), native balance fetch (P0), ERC-20 balance fetch (P1), multi-chain sequential fetch (P1), RPC failover (P1), cache behavior (P2)
3. Ensure separate vitest.e2e.config.ts with node env, 30s timeout, sequential execution, verbose reporter, 2 retries
4. Standardize npm script: test:e2e
5. Document E2E strategy in repo ARCHITECTURE.md
6. All tests must pass: npm run build && npm test && npm run test:e2e
